properties.areaDesc: Upper Yampa River Basin; Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 3:03AM MST until January 13 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Periods of moderate snow with lulls of much lighter snow
or no snow at all at times through Monday evening. Total snow
accumulations of 7 to 14 inches with locally higher amounts
expected. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph above 9500 feet.

* WHERE...Upper Yampa River Basin and Gore and Elk
Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys.

* WHEN...From noon today to 8 PM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult to impossible with blowing
snow significantly reducing visibility at times. A detailed map
of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MST MONDAY
